original_title: IATA delegation calls on Ports, Shipping and Aviation Minister
original_body_lines: A delegation from the International Air Transport Association (IATA) led by its Regional Vice President for Asia-Pacific Philip Goh called on Ports, Shipping, and Aviation Minister Nimal Siripala de Silva yesterday. The delegation is on a visit to Sri Lanka to participate in the conference ‘Re-awakening the Civil Aviation Industry of Sri Lanka’ organised by the Civil Aviation Authority today.
